divs: Sighting DetailsI was on a municipal bus with my brother and saw that something was moving slowly in a high-activity aircraft and saw that it was a plane because it was still and then moved quickly grabbed a cell phone and recorded by TORS time because we did not have a cell phone in hand, but when you were recording the object is stand still and suddenly it was not able to capture well as the bus was moving a lot and when I went to look at the object was gone but in the video it shows the fine l as the object is removed rapidly from the place.
